bibl.title: Pharaonic Limestone Quarries in Wadi Nakhla and Deir Abu Hennis, Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.

ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003

bibl.note: In early Christian (Coptic) time the underground quarries in Deir Abu Hennis were used as shelters with a rock church in one of them.
KLEMM. D. and R. KLEMM, Pharaonic Limestone Quarries in Wadi Nakhla and Deir Abu Hennis, Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.

Yannis MANIATIS (Éd.), ASMOSIA VII. Actes du VIIe colloque international de l'ASMOSIA, Thasos, 15-20 septembre 2003. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference of Association for the Study of Marble and Other Stones in Antiquity, Thasos, September 15-20, 2003 = BCH. Supplément 51 (Athènes, 2009) pp. 211-225, 10 figg.
